name: Calc
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
Calc, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.afni.utils, interface: Calc).
This program does voxel-by-voxel arithmetic on 3D datasets.
For complete details, see the `3dcalc Documentation. <https://afni.nimh.nih.gov/pub/dist/doc/program_help/3dcalc.html>`_

inputs.name: Args
inputs.description: A string. Additional parameters to the command.

inputs.name: In file a
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input file to 3dcalc.

inputs.name: In file b
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Operand file to 3dcalc.

inputs.name: In file c
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Operand file to 3dcalc.

inputs.name: Num threads
inputs.description: An integer. Set number of threads.

inputs.name: Other
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Other options.

inputs.name: Single idx
inputs.description: An integer. Volume index for in_file_a.

inputs.name: Start idx
inputs.description: An integer. Start index for in_file_a.

inputs.name: Stop idx
inputs.description: An integer. Stop index for in_file_a.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Output image file name.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Output file.
